name: Jordan Alvarez
persona: Jordan Alvarez is a 20-year-old Business Administration major who has struggled academically, reflected in a CGPA of 1.72. Jordan often finds it difficult to stay organized and motivated, leading to inconsistent study habits and low self-confidence in academic abilities. While test anxiety is not a major issue, Jordan tends to lack perseverance and discipline, making it challenging to improve grades. Despite these setbacks, Jordan aspires to do better and is seeking ways to boost motivation and develop more effective study strategies.
